pageContext.claim: “Big problems and discrepancies with Mail In Ballots all over the USA. Must have final total on November 3rd.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has falsely warned of possible fraud by mail-in ballots, hyping local incidents and hitches as part of some vast conspiracy to deny him re-election. There is no legal requirement that mandates the immediate reporting of all election results in the country; delayed counting is unavoidable when so many people are avoiding election lines during the pandemic.
